events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't updated in days, and I'm very concerned about the delay in shipping.
The reported issue involves a late shipment and delayed delivery caused by tracking inactivity.
Assigning this delivery delay case to the customer support agent specialized in order tracking and fulfillment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out about your order delay. I'm here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and any additional details you have from the tracking system so I can investigate?
My order number is 123456789. The last tracking update was from the shipping center five days ago, and I havenâ€™t received any new information since then.
I have contacted the shipping carrier to get more information about the delay. We expect to receive an update within 48 hours and will inform you as soon as possible.
Okay, thank you for the update. I hope to hear back soon because I really need the package for an upcoming event.
The shipping carrier has located your package, and it is now out for delivery. You should receive your order by the end of today.
Just following up to ensure you have received your package and that everything is in order now. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience while we resolved the delivery delay issue.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience.
